{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R7500 |revision=v2 |asin=B01GPAOJJG |fcc_date=05/26/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY315100301 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8064 |cpu1_cspeed=1.4 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9980 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''600Mbps''' - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2350 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R7500.aspx}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R7500v2}} *"2976495801" appears to be silkscreened on the board R7500v2. *"2976484100" appears to be silkscreened on the board R7500v1. {{see also|Delta Networks|Netgear R7500}} ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32445-netgear-ac2350-router-on-the-way ''NETGEAR AC2350 Router On The Way'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32899-netgear-r7500v2-nighthawk-x4-smart-wi-fi-router-reviewed''Tim Higgins''' review on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-r7500v2-r7800-r8500-have-shown-up.24717/ ''R7500v2'' internal images on '''SNB''' forums] *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showpost.php?p=137946&postcount=40 ''R7500v1'' internal images on '''SNB''' forums] __NOTOC__
